notes_text: Personal use is generally not prosecuted in court but subject to summary fine. Medicinal cannabis possible under a special license since 2006; in 2014, 223 licenses were issued.
notes: Personal use is generally not prosecuted in court but subject to summary fine. Medicinal cannabis possible under a special license since 2006; in 2014, 223 licenses were issued.
notes_raw: {{main|Cannabis in Finland}} Personal use is generally not prosecuted in court but subject to summary fine. Medicinal cannabis possible under a special license since 2006; in 2014, 223 licenses were issued.<ref>{{cite web|last1=Silvàn|first1=Sini|title=Lääkekannabis edelleen marginaalinen lääke|date=20 April 2015 |url=http://yle.fi/aihe/artikkeli/2015/04/20/laakekannabis-edelleen-marginaalinen-laake|publisher=YLE|access-date=6 December 2016|language=fi|archive-date=21 July 2018|archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20180721162214/https://yle.fi/aihe/artikkeli/2015/04/20/laakekannabis-edelleen-marginaalinen-laake|url-status=live}}</ref>
